021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
024import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
025import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
026
027import java.util.Date;
028import java.util.Map;
029import java.util.NavigableMap;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.TreeMap;
032import java.util.UUID;
033
034/**
035 * SortedHistory
036 *
037 * @author creatorfromhell
038 * @since 0.1.2.0
039 */
040public class SortedHistory {
041
042  protected final NavigableMap<Long, UUID> receipts = new TreeMap<>();
043
044  private final UUID account;
045  private long lastSort;
046
047  public SortedHistory(final UUID account) {
048
049    this.account = account;
050    this.lastSort = -1;
051
052    sort();
053  }
054
055  public void sort() {
056
057    final long time = new Date().getTime();
058
059    if(lastSort != -1 && time - lastSort < MainConfig.yaml().getLong("Core.Transactions.History.Refresh", 1200L)) {
060      return;
061    }
062
063    final Optional<Account> acc = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(account);
064
065    if(acc.isPresent()) {
066      int i = 0;
067      for(final Receipt receipt : TransactionManager.receipts().getReceiptsByParticipant(acc.get().getIdentifier())) {
068        receipts.put(receipt.getTime(), receipt.getId());
069
070        if(i >= 200) {
071          break;
072        }
073
074        i++;
075      }
076    }
077    lastSort = new Date().getTime();
078  }
079
080  public NavigableMap<Long, UUID> getPage(int page) {
081
082    sort();
083
084    if(page > maxPages()) page = 1;
085
086    final NavigableMap<Long, UUID> values = new TreeMap<>();
087    final int start = ((page * 5) - 5) + 1;
088    final int end = start + 5;
089
090    final int i = 1;
091    for(final Map.Entry<Long, UUID> entry : receipts.entrySet()) {
092      if(i < start) continue;
093
094      values.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
095
096      if(i >= end) break;
097    }
098    return values;
099  }
100
101  public int maxPages() {
102
103    int max = receipts.size() / 5;
104
105    if((receipts.size() % 5) > 0) {
106      max += 1;
107    }
108    return max;
109  }
110
111  public NavigableMap<Long, UUID> getReceipts() {
112
113    return receipts;
114  }
115}
